Package system

Interface Summary
Computer Defines a computer that can execute a Task.
Computer2Space Compute server's abstraction of the compute space (Space)
Shared<T> An interface abstracting properties of an object thats shared among all of a computation's unfinished tasks by the compute space.
 

Class Summary
Broadcast The class represents a broadcast message sent by a computer to the compute space.
ComputerImpl Defines the remote server which is accessed by the client for execution of objects of type Task
ComputerProxy For every Computer instance that registers with the compute space (Space), there is a proxy maintained by the space.
ResultImpl<T> Implementation of the Result interface
SpaceImpl Implementation of the Space Interface.
Successor The multithreading design implemented by this class is that of the Cilk runtime.
TspShared A class abstracting shared objects for the branch-and-bound TSP problem.
 

Enum Summary
Successor.Status Status of this successor thread
